title: PARKING INCLUDED SPECIAL
short_desc: No need to worry about the stress of finding parking on the streets of NYC. Let us at the Washington Jefferson Hotel park your car.
long_desc:
Don’t risk having to deal with the crowded Manhattan streets, confusing parking regulations, and finding a parking meter – Let us at the Washington Jefferson Hotel park your car!

Whether you’re doing business in Rockefeller Center or seeing a Broadway Show in the Theatre District, book our hotel in Midtown Manhattan with parking for a hassle free stay in New York City.

Details:

  • Valet Parking for up to 24 hours
  • Complimentary wireless internet
  • Additional discount available

Terms and Conditions:

  • In and out privileges not included
  • SUV or large vehicles may be subject to an additional fee
  • Taxes of 14.75% and $3.50/room/night not included
  • Package based on availability
page_title: Hotels In Midtown Manhattan With Parking | WJ Hotel
meta_content: Book our hotel in Midtown Manhattan with parking includedl to enjoy a stay with less stress and more play! Learn more about our Manhattan hotel deals today.
